function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of critical thinking and verification of online information leading to sharing of misinformation.","Impact":"Widespread dissemination of fake news and misinformation.","Mitigation":"Promote media literacy education and fact-checking practices.","Technologies":"AI-based content verification tools.","People":"General public, social media users.","Owner":"Educational institutions, fact-checking organizations."},{"Description":"Inability to accurately determine the reliability of news sources.","Impact":"Increased sharing of unreliable information.","Mitigation":"Encourage the use of multiple sources for verifying information.","Technologies":"Blockchain-based news verification platforms.","People":"General public, news consumers.","Owner":"Media organizations, technology developers."},{"Description":"Fear and anxiety altering decision-making processes during a pandemic.","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to misinformation and rumors.","Mitigation":"Provide clear and reliable communication from health authorities.","Technologies":"Crisis communication platforms, social media monitoring tools.","People":"General public, individuals experiencing fear and anxiety.","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies."}]}
